title: Mughal Empire
summary: The Mughal, Mogul, or Moghul Empire was an early modern empire in South Asia.[10] For some two centuries, the empire stretched from the outer fringes of the Indus basin in the west, northern Afghanistan in the northwest, and Kashmir in the north, to the highlands of present-day Assam and Bangladesh in the east, and the uplands of the Deccan plateau in south India.[11]
